name: Project Chase
description:
Hunt down Agent Chase across 10 levels on rooftops and streets while avoiding the many explosions in your way!

Youtube Channel

Made with Unity, submission for The Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. Developed in 7 days by me, a 13-year-old idiot. :) I also made this during school exams... pls don't bully me lol.

Game made by IcarusoofDev.

Soundtrack: 

Building Assets: Simple City pack plain, SimplePoly - Town Pack
